AboutPage.introduction: <years></years>+ years of professional experience building high-scale systems for major players like Multiplan and PepsiCo.
AboutPage.curiosity: (and as you probably have noticed, also a coffee lover).
AboutPage.professional_summary: Expert in the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem with a strong focus on infrastructure optimization and performance. Proven ability to lead end-to-end product development, from initial MVPs to production environments serving 100k+ daily active users and millions of records.
AboutPage.personal_space: This is my own corner of the web. You're more than welcome to jump in with ideas or start a conversation; any exchange that proves useful is always welcome.
AboutPage.social_invitation: Feel free to reach out to me on my social media!
